Description:
Greet and assist customers with enthusiasm, creating a positive and memorable shopping experience.
Develop a comprehensive understanding of our motorcycles, their features, and benefits to effectively communicate with potential buyers.
Identify customer needs, offer tailored solutions, and guide them through the purchase process with confidence.
Actively seek out new sales opportunities through networking, social media, and customer referrals.
Accurately complete all necessary paperwork, including sales contracts and financing agreements.
Maintain ongoing communication with customers, providing updates on the status of their orders and addressing any concerns.
Strive to achieve and exceed sales targets and quotas to contribute to the dealership's success.
Stay updated on industry trends and competitor offerings to provide valuable insights to customers.
Organize and conduct test rides, ensuring a safe and enjoyable experience for customers.
Educate customers on motorcycle safety, maintenance, and riding gear to enhance their ownership experience.
Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and sales activities in the dealership's CRM system.
Work collaboratively with colleagues to create a positive and supportive team environment.Skills
Skills:
Proven sales experience, preferably in the automotive or motorcycle industry.
Passion for motorcycles and a deep understanding of motorcycle culture.
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
Strong negotiation and closing abilities.
Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
Valid motorcycle license (preferred).
High school diploma or equivalent (additional education in sales or marketing is a plus).
Preferred fluent in Arabic
